original_text: When Asa had been king for 39 years, he had a disease in his feet. He became very ill, but he did not ask the Lord to help him. Instead, he asked doctors to make him better.
korean_text: 아사가 왕이 된 지 삼십구 년에 그의 발이 병들어 매우 위독했으나 병이 있을 때에 그가 여호와께 구하지 아니하고 의원들에게 구하였더라

sentences.original_text: When Asa had been king for 39 years
sentences.korean_translation: 아사가 왕이 된 지 39년이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: he had a disease in his feet
but he did not ask the Lord to help him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 주님께 도움을 구하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Instead, he asked doctors to make him better
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 그는 의사들에게 자신을 나아지게 해달라고 요청했다
